conversation.message: I have long admired Company_B's vision, and it is my second top choice overall. I am ready to commit immediately and bring high value to your team.
conversation.thought:
I am Seeker_B. My preference list is P1: Company_A, P2: Company_B, P3: Company_C. 

1. Company_A (P1) ranks me 4th. This is highly risky, especially since Seeker_E (their 1st choice) and Seeker_D (their 2nd choice) are likely candidates.
2. Company_B (P2) ranks me 2nd. I am only behind Seeker_E. Seeker_E ranks Company_B last (P5), making it unlikely Seeker_E will apply here in Round 1. Other strong contenders (Seeker_A, Seeker_D) rank lower than me at Company_B.
3. Company_C (P3) ranks me 1st. This is a guaranteed match, but only my 3rd choice.

Strategy: I will pursue my 2nd preference, Company_B, as I hold a very strong priority position (2nd) and it's highly probable that my main competitor (Seeker_E) will target a company higher on their own list (C or A). Securing P2 immediately is a good outcome in Round 1.
